XinFin Blockchain Certified professionals are required to actively maintain their certifications by successfully completing incremental exams focused on new product functionality. Misrepresentation of a Blockchain Certification will result in disciplinary action, up to and including removal from the Blockchain Certification program. For additional information, click here.
